name: Of a Feather (BKurrStudio)
description:
OUR GAME

You play as a crow who has lost its feathers and cannot fly. In order to regain your ability to fly, you must talk to people and listen to their stories. You will be given a feather in learning about their experiences and doing small quests for them. When you gather enough feathers, you can fly away and win the game.

CONTEXT

This game was made for the Cultural-Cross Impact Gamejam 2022 sponsored by Unity and Games For Changes. It was a 6-day jam with the theme "Amplifying voices".

CREDITS

  • Joel Palta 
  • Victor Sassi
  • Yan Tibet 
CONTROLS

Movement: WASD or Arrows Camera rotation: Mouse Change camera view: Mouse wheel Jump: Space Interact: E

If you unlock the ability to glide: Hold Space If you unlock the ability to fly: Fly: Space / Plunge: Left Shift
